sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ion-page>
        <ion-header>
            <ion-toolbar>
                <ion-title>iBuy</ion-title>
            </ion-toolbar>
        </ion-header>
        <ion-content>
            <ion-img></ion-img>
            <ion-button color="light" expand="block" fill="outline">Registrar-se com o Google</ion-button>
        </ion-content>
    </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
    import {  IonContent, IonHeader, IonPage, IonTitle, IonToolbar, IonImg, IonButton} from '@ionic/vue';
    export default {
      name: 'LoginPage', 
      components: {
          IonContent,
          IonHeader, 
          IonPage, 
          IonTitle, 
          IonToolbar,
          IonImg,
          IonButton,
      },
    };
</script>

<style>
  ion-content{
    --background: #FFFFFF url('../../public/assets/borders.png') no-repeat center center / cover !important;

  }
  ion-button{
    border: 2px solid #1B4C81;
    color:#1B4C81;
    bottom: 128px;
    text-align: center;
    position: absolute;
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 4px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25));
  }
</style>
